prompt: Design a premium 4BHK villa for a 40x60 east-facing plot. The client wants a modern aesthetic, a double-height living room, and a clear separation between public and private spaces. High-end finishes. No strict budget, focus on quality and luxury. Vastu compliance is a must.
scratchpad: Large plot (2400 sq ft), east-facing, premium segment. G+1 or G+2 is possible. Double-height living is a key feature. Vastu for east-facing is excellent. Entrance in the East. Ground floor: Double-height living room in NE for grandeur and light. Pooja in NE. Kitchen in SE. Guest bedroom/lounge in NW. Formal dining near the kitchen. Powder room. First floor: Master bedroom in SW with a large balcony. Two other bedrooms with attached baths. A family lounge overlooking the double-height living area. Structure: RCC frame to handle the double-height space and large spans. Materials: High-end. Italian marble flooring, premium wood for doors/windows, modular kitchen with top-tier appliances, designer bathroom fittings. Large glass panels for the double-height area. This plan will have more complex geometry and a higher number of elements.
